description: Survive endless waves of enemies in this intense bullet heaven arcade game! Choose from 4 unique characters (Bananza, Medusin, Orb, Train), each with different weapons and passive abilities. Fight procedurally generated enemies, powerful bosses, and reach the devastating HYPER MODE at 10 minutes. Level up with strategic upgrades, collect power-ups, and compete for the highest score. WASD to move, auto-combat.
